name: SCNActionable
desc: Methods for running actions on nodes.

items.name: func runAction(SCNAction)
items.desc: Adds an action to the list of actions executed by the node.

items.name: func runAction(SCNAction, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds an action to the list of actions executed by the node. SceneKit calls the specified block when the action completes.

items.name: func runAction(SCNAction, forKey: String?)
items.desc: Adds an identifiable action to the list of actions executed by the node.

items.name: func runAction(SCNAction, forKey: String?, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds an identifiable action to the list of actions executed by the node. SceneKit calls the specified block when the action completes.

items.name: func action(forKey: String) -> SCNAction?
items.desc: Returns an action associated with a specific key.

items.name: var hasActions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the node is currently executing any actions.

items.name: var actionKeys: [String]
items.desc: The list of keys for which the node has attached actions.

items.name: func removeAction(forKey: String)
items.desc: Removes an action associated with a specific key.

items.name: func removeAllActions()
items.desc: Ends and removes all actions from the node.
